entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
